summary: The module implements a TensorFlow DeepLab backend for the Raster Vision framework, handling the full lifecycle of semantic segmentation models—including data preparation into TFRecords, configuration of training, evaluation, and export parameters, checkpoint management, inference execution, and generation of debug visualizations—while supporting synchronization with local and cloud storage.
business_intent: Provide an automated, scalable solution for training and deploying high‑accuracy image segmentation models on geospatial imagery, enabling organizations to extract actionable insights for applications such as land use mapping, environmental monitoring, and infrastructure planning.
